game.name: Train Simulator: BR Class 45 'Peak' Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The ‘Peak’ of British Railway’s diesel fleet comes to Train Simulator in original BR blue livery.Built by BR’s Derby and Crewe Works between 1960 and 1962, the Sulzer Type 4 diesel locomotive were the main passenger locomotives on the Midland Main Line from their introduction until their withdrawal
game.shortDescriptionEn: The ‘Peak’ of British Railway’s diesel fleet comes to Train Simulator in original BR blue livery.Built by BR’s Derby and Crewe Works between 1960 and 1962, the Sulzer Type 4 diesel locomotive were the main passenger locomotives on the Midland Main Line from their introduction until their withdrawal
